title: I can't buy worlds 2018 orb with tokens
body: Hi all. Someone knows or have same problem? I have 327 worlds 2018 tokens and i cant buy a orb with 300 tokens.. when i press the forge button it apear a message: CRAFTING FAILED ! It appears this Hextech unit has bad motivator. Please try restarting your client and maybe is a issue with the service. And give me a link to service status. I was restarting my client but nothing... someone has same problem or knows something about that? Thx a lot.
